overview: Lenskart is India's leading eyewear brand offering eyeglasses, sunglasses, contact lenses, and home eye check-ups.

faq.a: We offer prescription eyeglasses, sunglasses, contact lenses, powered sunglasses, and accessories. We also provide home eye check-ups.

faq.q: Do you offer a free eye test?
faq.a: Yes! Lenskart provides a free home eye test in multiple cities with certified optometrists.
Eyeglasses start from ₹499, premium collections from ₹1500+, sunglasses from ₹599, and contact lenses from ₹199 onwards.

faq.q: Do you have a return or exchange policy?
faq.a: Yes, Lenskart offers a 14-day no-questions-asked return or exchange policy on most products.
Standard eyeglasses are delivered within 3-7 days. Contact lenses and ready stock items ship faster.

faq.q: Do you have a free trial?
faq.a: Yes! You can use the 3D Try-On on the app or website. Some frames also support Home Try-On.
Anyone who wants stylish, durable eyewear — students, professionals, seniors, or kids.
